name: safety-goggles
effect: Held: Prevents damage from powder moves and the damage from Hail and Sandstorm.
short_effect: Held: Prevents damage from powder moves and the damage from Hail and Sandstorm.

flavor_text.sun-moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These goggles protect the holder from both weather-related damage and powder.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These goggles protect the holder from both weather-related damage and powder.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These goggles protect the holder from both weather-related damage and powder.
